title: Summertime Sadness
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:17.33] Kiss me hard before you go
[00:21.52] Summertime sadness
[00:25.85] I just wanted you to know
[00:29.72] That baby, you the best
[00:33.66] I got my red dress on tonight
[00:37.50] Dancin' in the dark, in the pale moonlight
[00:41.69] Done my hair up real big, beauty queen style
[00:46.05] High heels off, I'm feelin' alive
[00:51.58] Oh, my God, I feel it in the air
[00:55.19] Telephone wires above are sizzlin' like a snare
[00:59.65] Honey, I'm on fire, I feel it everywhere
[01:03.84] Nothin' scares me anymore
[01:06.74] (One, two, three, four)
[01:08.84] Kiss me hard before you go
[01:13.04] Summertime sadness
[01:17.48] I just wanted you to know
[01:21.44] That baby, you the best
[01:26.01] I got that summertime, summertime sadness
[01:30.67] Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
[01:34.92] Got that summertime, summertime sadness
[01:39.32] Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh
[01:42.34] I'm feelin' electric tonight
[01:46.26] Cruisin' down the coast, goin' about 99
[01:50.47] Got my bad baby by my heavenly side
[01:54.49] I know if I go, I'll die happy tonight
[02:00.18] Oh, my God, I feel it in the air
[02:03.52] Telephone wires above are sizzlin' like a snare
[02:08.02] Honey, I'm on fire, I feel it everywhere
[02:12.38] Nothin' scares me anymore
[02:15.38] (One, two, three, four)
[02:17.30] Kiss me hard before you go
[02:21.50] Summertime sadness
[02:25.76] I just wanted you to know
[02:29.73] That baby, you the best
[02:34.56] I got that summertime, summertime sadness
[02:39.12] Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
[02:43.55] Got that summertime, summertime sadness
[02:47.25] Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh
[02:51.88] Think I'll miss you forever
[02:55.27] Like the stars miss the sun in the morning sky
[03:00.36] Later's better than never
[03:03.87] Even if you're gone, I'm gonna drive (drive), drive
[03:13.26] I got that summertime, summertime sadness
[03:17.52] Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
[03:22.21] Got that summertime, summertime sadness
[03:26.25] Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh
[03:30.04] Kiss me hard before you go
[03:34.68] Summertime sadness
[03:39.05] I just wanted you to know
[03:42.89] That baby, you the best
[03:47.52] I got that summertime, summertime sadness
[03:52.18] Su-su-summertime, summertime sadness
[03:56.53] Got that summertime, summertime sadness
[04:00.08] Oh, oh-oh, oh-oh
[04:02.31]
